name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】重大告知あり！紫咲シオンBirthdayアニソンライブ！！✨【#紫咲シオン生誕LIVE2024】 [HOb_TW8uK48]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs a high-energy medley of Pokémon-themed songs, featuring on-screen lyrics and Pokémon moves.
Houshou Marine joins Shion on stage for an MC segment, where they discuss their dreams of catching Pokémon and becoming adults.
Shion and Marine perform a duet of 'Pocket Fantasy' (Pocket ni Fantasy), the classic Pokémon ending theme.

subtitles.original: まずは手始め
subtitles.english: First, to start off...

subtitles.original: マルチバトルでばっちり決めたら
subtitles.english: Once you've made a perfect move in a multi-battle

subtitles.original: GOOD GOOD SMILE!!
subtitles.english: GOOD GOOD SMILE!!

subtitles.original: もっと
subtitles.english: More

subtitles.original: 過去と未来

subtitles.original: 僕らはめざす
subtitles.english: We aim for

subtitles.original: 誓ったあの場所へ
subtitles.english: To that place we promised

subtitles.original: イェイイェイイェイイェイ イェ！！
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay yay Yay!!

subtitles.original: 甘くないさ バトルはいつだって
subtitles.english: It's not sweet, battles are always

subtitles.original: からい？にがい？しぶい？すっぱいね？
subtitles.english: Spicy? Bitter? Astringent? Sour, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 生きてるんだ だから感じよう
subtitles.english: We're alive, so let's feel it

subtitles.original: いっしょに
subtitles.english: Together

subtitles.original: イェイイェイイェイイェイ イェ！！
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay yay Yay!!

subtitles.original: アクアジェットで ぶっ飛ばしてけ
subtitles.english: Blow them away with Aqua Jet

subtitles.original: モヤモヤ気分 霧払いして
subtitles.english: Mist-clear that foggy feeling

subtitles.original: ロッククライム ほら乗り越えたら
subtitles.english: Rock Climb, see, once you've overcome it

subtitles.original: GOOD GOOD SMILE!!
subtitles.english: GOOD GOOD SMILE!!

subtitles.original: みんな
subtitles.english: Everyone

subtitles.original: GOOD GOOD SMILE!!
subtitles.english: GOOD GOOD SMILE!!

subtitles.original: ねぇ、君たちの夢って何かな？
subtitles.english: Hey, what's your dream?

subtitles.original: ポケモン151匹ゲット！
subtitles.english: To catch all 151 Pokémon!

subtitles.original: あら、私と同じ！
subtitles.english: Oh, same as me!

subtitles.original: え～？おとなのくせにへんなの～
subtitles.english: Eh~? That's weird for an adult~

subtitles.original: なによ～ いけない？
subtitles.english: What~? Is that bad?

subtitles.original: いけなくないけどさ...
subtitles.english: It's not bad, but...

subtitles.original: ねえ君たちさ、ほかにはどんなユメがあるの？
subtitles.english: Hey guys, what other dreams do you have?

subtitles.original: う～んとねぇ...
subtitles.english: Umm, well...

subtitles.original: もうひとつのゆめはねぇ...
subtitles.english: My other dream is...

subtitles.original: はやくおとなになりたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to become an adult soon

subtitles.original: えっ、どうして？
subtitles.english: Eh, why?

subtitles.original: はやくおとなになりたいの
subtitles.english: I want to become an adult soon

subtitles.original: こどもって楽しいじゃない
subtitles.english: Being a child is fun, isn't it?

subtitles.original: でもね、なんだかなってみたい
subtitles.english: But, I somehow want to try becoming one

subtitles.original: じゃあこんどはわたしのユメ、いうわね...
subtitles.english: Then, I'll tell you my dream this time...

subtitles.original: もういちどこどもにもどってみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try being a child once more

subtitles.original: え～？なんで～？
subtitles.english: Eh~? Why~?

subtitles.original: もういちどこどもにもどってみたいの
subtitles.english: I want to try being a child once more

subtitles.original: おとなでいいのに
subtitles.english: Being an adult is fine, though

subtitles.original: いちにちだけでもなれないかな
subtitles.english: I wish I could be one for just a day

subtitles.original: なれっこないよ～
subtitles.english: There's no way you can~

subtitles.original: んもう、いじわるぅ
subtitles.english: Oh, you're so mean!

subtitles.original: むかしわたしが まだこどもだったころ
subtitles.english: A long time ago, when I was still a child

subtitles.original: ポケットにいれてた たくさんのたからもの
subtitles.english: The many treasures I used to keep in my pocket

subtitles.original: いまでもときどき かおをのぞかせるのよ
subtitles.english: Even now, they occasionally peek out

subtitles.original: それってもしかして ピカチュウ？
subtitles.english: Could that be... Pikachu?

subtitles.original: さあ、なんでしょうね？
subtitles.english: Well, I wonder what it is?

subtitles.original: むかしのこども いまのこども
subtitles.english: Children of the past, children of now

subtitles.original: ポケットのなかみは いつだって
subtitles.english: The contents of their pockets are always

subtitles.original: おとこのこでも おんなのこでも
subtitles.english: Whether it's a boy or a girl

subtitles.original: ポケットのなかみは だれだって ファンタジー
subtitles.english: Everyone's pocket is full of fantasy

subtitles.original: もしもおとなになったなら
subtitles.english: If I ever become an adult

subtitles.original: なにしてみたい？
subtitles.english: What would you want to do?

subtitles.original: こどもとあそんであげるんだ
subtitles.english: I'd play with the children

subtitles.original: やっぱりあそびたいんだ
subtitles.english: You just want to play after all

subtitles.original: でもね、しごともちょっとするよ
subtitles.english: But, I'll do a bit of work too

subtitles.original: あのね、わたしがもしもね...
subtitles.english: You know, if I could...

subtitles.original: もういちどこどもにもどれたなら
subtitles.english: If I could return to being a child once more

subtitles.original: なにしてみたいの？
subtitles.english: What would you want to do?

subtitles.original: あってみたいひとがいるの
subtitles.english: There's someone I want to see

subtitles.original: え～、だれなの～？
subtitles.english: Eh~, who is it~?

subtitles.original: いちにちだけでもあえないかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I could see them for just a day

subtitles.original: あ！はつこいのひとだ！
subtitles.english: Ah! It's your first crush!

subtitles.original: あったり～！
subtitles.english: Spot on!

subtitles.original: むかしわたしが いつかであうはずの
subtitles.english: A long time ago, for someone I was meant to meet

subtitles.original: ポケットにいれてた てづくりのプレゼント
subtitles.english: A handmade present I kept in my pocket

subtitles.original: いまでもときどき かおがあかくなるのよ
subtitles.english: Even now, my face occasionally turns red

subtitles.original: プレゼントわたせなかったの？
subtitles.english: You couldn't give them the present?

subtitles.original: さあ、どうだったかしら？
subtitles.english: Well, I wonder how it went?

subtitles.original: むかしのこども いまのこども
subtitles.english: Children of the past, children of now

subtitles.original: ポケットのなかみは いつだって
subtitles.english: The contents of their pockets are always

subtitles.original: おとこのこでも おんなのこでも
subtitles.english: Whether it's a boy or a girl

subtitles.original: ポケットのなかみは だれだって...
subtitles.english: The contents of everyone's pockets are...
